alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 01 at 10:12AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: Light to moderate snowfall continues this morning across portions of Converse County including Douglas and the North Laramie Range. Snowfall will continue into this afternoon with accumulations ranging from 1 to 3 inches across the lower elevations possibly approaching 5 inches in the higher terrain by late this afternoon. Snowfall will become much lighter this evening as the focus area for heavier snowfall shifts towards the Colorado Wyoming border. However, slick roads and low visibility from falling snow could make travel difficult at times through this afternoon and evening including Interstate 25 from Douglas to Casper.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
